title: Looking for a Diamond+ player to 1v1
body: I mean yeah its in the title, add me on NA if you're man enough

replies.body: I doubt anyone feels like wasting 20 minutes of their life to utterly erase you on howling abyss..

Everyone can see your stats. Maybe think about that before talking shit.

I understand most highschoolers think that the louder they cry and BS, the less people notice their errors, but it is actually quite the reverse.
